page.title: 12SANTON
page.content: Santon is a small community consisting of 6 habitable dwellings, only half of which are occupied during the week, and a very small church _ All Saints. It is situated on the north side of the Little Ouse about 1 mile to the east of Santon Downham near St. Helen's car park. The road peters out to tracks, one of which tunnels under the railway and continues to the A134. Only one service a year is held in the church on the Sunday nearest to the longest day. See also page 11, Worship in Santon Downham. All other aspects of life are the same as for Santon Downham except that Santon is in Norfolk and therefore comes under Thetford and the Breckland District.
